name: Nestle Nestum Original
description: Nestlé Nestum is a nutritious multi-grain wholesome family cereal that provides a great selection of wholewheat, multi-grains, rice and corn and fortified with 13 vitamins and minerals for your well-being.  You can prepare it any way you want – as a drink or porridge. Add in fresh or dry fruits to make it more nutritious and exciting! *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
